title: Men's Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sequence%2002_3970.jpg)

Good Day,

Can anyone help me to identify the font used for "Men'S" in the attached logo?

Thanks!

Font: 

 Lobster 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065501/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Fareha Johari

comments.content: Thanks a lot Ryuk! I've been searching on it for the whole day. Really appreciated it.
